text: Pas, ʙa [sazoi] pajmonsikanison va inkorason nisʙat ʙa ojoti Alloh taolo va kustori nohaqqi onon [az] pajomʙaron [la'natason kardem] va [ʙa xotiri in] suxanason, ki: "Dilhoi mo [coji suxani haq nest va] pusida ast", ʙalki Alloh taolo ʙa xotiri kufrason ʙar dilhojason muhr zadast. Binoʙar in cuz andake imon nameovarand
